21254:
Condemned to spend my life in darkness
Being punished beyond all sanity
Forever paying harmless sins
Bleak surroundins breaking my soul

Grotesque
Anger
Is killing
My
Passion for life

Going insane
No more dreams
Free me from pain
Convicted

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Long before man ever existed
We had to dwell in the void between spaces
Being prisoned now and for evermore
An utterly inhuman punishment
Having to wonder in nothingness
Is both a curse and a blessing
Stare into the untold eternity
Like oceans beyond the horizon
I'm your thoughts
Your despair
In control
Of your mind
Centuries ago we took our revenge
Showed you our true faces
Tempted to be released
Possess your darkest dominions
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Rape Of Mankind

No truth will ever set you free
Or help to expose this conspiracy
Always being watched
Every move documented
No more freedom
Oppress the masses
The distress of
Knowing their total control
Not being able
To convince others
Try to spread the word
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Assembled from bits of other creatures
Created not born
Not having to age beyond recognition
I have no soul

Arrogance and ignoreance
A useful tool to destroy those with faith
I despise everything
And I will annihilate you all
Crucify and justify
The one's who won't follow
In your eyes I see your
Demise

I am the superior sovereign, creator of pain
Dressed in sin, filled with wrath
Vengefull is my vein

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

As we walk through the valley of transparent souls
We have to find the knowledge of sin
So we will fear the light as the darkness
Hate lies beyond the fall of any angels
Search the lies
In the insane sanity
And try to invent hope for
Those who have denied
Never seen
Never touched the wisdom of pure pain
Look into the anguish of faith
And see the helpless face of reality
Take a look and see the time forever
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

[Lead: Ideberg]

The beauty of your escaping soul
Behold my true distress
Your naked mind is barely existing
I have dreams you could never imagine
Explore your forbidden defiance
See the realm of temptation
Knowing anger
Will betray me
Disconnected
From all feelings
The chase for my existence
Centuries has passed me by
Suffering has now a face
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

This man was no deceiver
This man was never wrong
You must beware, believer
The prophecy is strong

The prophet has predicted
Fourhundred years ago
The king of fear decided
The north of earth must go

Holocaust
See it coming
You can't escape
All are bound to be destroyed

A bloody man inunder
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Emotions crucified from the beginning of time
Condemned, not knowing what's my crime
The dreams that ever grew in my mind
Has risen to hatered beyond mankind
Obsessed thoughts are choking me
No one else will ever see
So alone, so cut off, so lost
Have to be free, whatever it will cost

I'm falling below mental darkness

The demons taking control over my head
Won't ever leave me until I'm dead
Insanity calling me from inside
Nowhere to go, nowhere to hide
